participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and expressive, Emily often reflects on her feelings and enjoys creative outlets.
participant_1.background: I grew up with my mother and dogs and now we are close. I am from a place where rain is always welcome. I lost my job but I am grateful for the support of my friends and family. I have a lot of feelings, and I like to write them down in my journal. I love lasagna like I'm Garfield.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Jake enjoys interacting with others and has a passion for his job as a barista.
participant_2.background: I'm going to go shopping and test drive my new car. I have been to a few renaissance fairs. I take forever to get tasks done so I start early and clock out late. I work as a barista. I love my job.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
My day is going well! I'm going shopping and test driving my new car.
Oh my, that sounds like a lot of fun! I'm happy to hear that you're having a good day.
Thanks! I am. What are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out. I lost my job recently but I'm grateful for the support of my friends and family.
I'm sorry to hear that you lost your job, but I'm glad to hear that you have a supportive support system. What are you doing to keep busy while you're looking for a new job?
I've been spending a lot of time writing in my journal and journaling about my feelings. I also love lasagna so I've been making a lot of that.
That sounds like a great way to stay busy and productive. I love lasagna too! I'm actually a barista and I love my job. I take forever to get tasks done so I start early and clock out late.
That's so interesting! I've never been to a renaissance fair but I've always wanted to go. What's it like?
They're a lot of fun! There's lots of people dressed up in costumes and there's always something to see and do.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm going to have to try to go to one sometime.
You should! They're always a good time.
